New Records: Najmul Hossain Shanto registered his career-best innings of 71 in a T20I match
Mustafizur Rahman returned to his effective best with 2 wickets for 15 runs
Key Match Events: Shanto's career-best innings and Mustafizur's return to form were pivotal in Bangladesh's victory over Zimbabwe
Pre-Game Insights: Shanto and Mustafizur were under pressure due to poor performances before this match
The team management supported Shanto, which drew criticism from some fans
Post-Match Reflections: The win boosted Bangladesh's confidence ahead of upcoming matches against India and Pakistan
Shanto expressed relief at finally converting a good start into a significant innings
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bangladesh's pace attack was effective in defending the total of 151 runs
The match was significant for Shanto's personal career milestone
